Articles.Content: Does anybody know where I can find some nice skyboxes? If so could you let me know? And if you have any personal recommendations I would appreciate it if you mentioned it ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I use Raredens skybox and it looks great imo. You can spot real constellations like Orion too ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87311-Rareden-s-Real-8k-Skybox-for-Texture-Replacer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87311-Rareden-s-Real-8k-Skybox-for-Texture-Replacer)
